review.title: “Working at Joseph C. McCully, Esq. was challenging.”
review.pros: Pros – A small law office such as Joseph C. McCully would be a great opportunity for some who are looking to obtain office experience.
review.cons: Cons – Joseph C McCully's office is a small office which typically does not offer benefits and the employees are not protected by programs such as the Family Leave Act, etc.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Attorneys sometimes need to understand that they may not be the best qualified to manage a business. They should follow the advice of a good business consultant or administrator on how to manage the office and spend their time litigating.
